entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
